articles.author: Amanda Silberling
articles.title: Skechers is making kids’ shoes with a hidden AirTag compartment - TechCrunch
articles.description: Skechers launches kids' shoes with built-in AirTag holder.
articles.content:
Skechers introduced a line of kids’ sneakers that contain a hidden compartment where parents can slip in an Apple AirTag. 
Inside the heel of the shoe, a small insert can be lifted to reveal the com… [+1987 chars]
